name: df-lcmf
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(clcmf, cmpt(s0, cpw(cz), cif(nat0, cinf(crab(s1, cn, wral(s2, cv(s0), wbr(cv(s2), cdvds, cv(s1)))), cr, clt), wcel(nat0, cv(s0)))))
comment: Define the ` _lcm ` function on a set of integers. (Contributed by AV, 21-Aug-2020.) (Revised by AV, 16-Sep-2020.)
